snippet: A joint amphibious landing on a remote island was canceled to avoid angering China.
abstract: United States and Japan begin enormous joint military drills, but part of exercise that might have angered China is cancelled.
lead_paragraph: A joint amphibious landing on a remote island was canceled to avoid angering China.

headline.seo: U.S. and Japan Begin Huge Military Drill, Minus Key Part
